questions.question: 1. What is the primary function of a centrifugal pump?

answers.c: To transfer fluid from a lower to a higher elevation

questions.question: 2. In a centrifugal pump, the fluid enters the impeller in which direction?
3. What does the term 'specific speed' refer to in centrifugal pump performance?

answers.a: The speed of the pump shaft
answers.b: A dimensionless parameter that characterizes pump geometry and performance
answers.c: The speed at which cavitation occurs
answers.d: The speed at which the pump reaches maximum efficiency

questions.question: 4. What is the main purpose of the casing in a centrifugal pump?

answers.b: To convert kinetic energy into pressure energy
answers.c: To guide the flow of fluid

questions.question: 5. Which of the following is NOT a factor affecting centrifugal pump efficiency?
